You can choose whether you want to add i: Ungakhetha bona ufuna ukufaka ingeniso nofana iindleko esitatimendeni sakho sengeniso.
See a list of income types. For income t: Qala irhelo lemihlobo yeengeniso. Malungana nengeniso engekho erhelweni leli, ungakhetha 'Enye'

Great! Your income has now been added to: Khuhle! Ingeniso yakho sele ifakiwe esitatimendeni sakho sengeniso esirhunyeziweko kuthebhu yemali.
